alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 01 at 9:39AM EST until March 09 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... Wabash River at New Harmony. .Dry weather the rest of the week will allow the river to crest today and begin a slow fall later tomorrow. For the Wabash River...including New Harmony...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY, MARCH 09... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at New Harmony. * WHEN...Until Wednesday, March 09. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 19.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is cresting and will begin a slow fall late tomorrow. It will fall below flood stage Wednesday, March 09. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
